author: @a_vickyp8360
text: #14: It's interesting how that analysis can lead to some hypothesis.  I thought Avengers was great and Captain Marvel not so much, but the data, is the data!! #66daysofdata

author: @Kittyboyfan
text: Interesting. I was wondering how representative this approach is. Querying '#CaptailMarvel' would only pull up a portion of the overall Twitter conversation on the movie, as most casual users don't use hashtags in that way. You're likely looking at a sample of mostly media tweets. Doesn't devalue the analysis of course, great work!
